subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Whereas David Beckham is looking for a cushy spot to land in Major League Soccer, Juan Montoya has already ascertained that there are no soft edges to the oval tracks of Nascar.
snippet: Whereas David Beckham is looking for a cushy spot to land in Major League Soccer, Juan Montoya has already ascertained that there are no soft edges to the oval tracks of Nascar.
